title: Geekageddon Café Opens in Berlin
summary: A new café inside the Berlin R&D hub offers live coding stations, unlimited cold brew, and quantum-safe Wi-Fi.

title: Hackathon Winners Build Wearable IDE
summary: Students at Geekageddon Montreal prototyped a gesture-powered IDE that runs entirely on AR glasses.

title: Robotics Guild ships Open-Source Drone Stack
summary: Geekageddon Robotics Guild members in Bangalore released a drone autopilot that speaks ROS 3.0 natively.

title: Geekageddon Nairobi Spins Up Climate Lab
summary: A new climate tech residency pairs local scientists with Geekageddon ML mentors to monitor urban heat islands.

title: Community Spotlight: Accessibility Guild
summary: The Accessibility Guild in Austin shipped 25 open-source components for screen-reader-first dashboards.
